name: api_rendering_SortingGroup
description: Adding a SortingGroup component to a GameObject will ensure that all Renderers within the GameObject's descendants will be sorted and rendered together.

properties.name: sortAtRoot
properties.description: Ignores any parent SortingGroup and sorts this and its descendant Renderers against other Renderers

properties.name: sortingLayerID
properties.description: Unique ID of the Renderer's sorting layer.

properties.name: sortingLayerName
properties.description: Name of the Renderer's sorting layer.

properties.name: sortingOrder
properties.description: Renderer's order within a sorting layer.
